message.name: ERR_NO_CASE_DELIVERY_PATTERN_ON_DATE
message.locale: The delivery pattern selected for case '%1n', has no value on '%2d'. Please select a different delivery pattern for this period.

message.name: INF_UNDEROVERPAYMENT_DETECTED
message.locale: An under/over payment identified has not been processed automatically.

message.name: INF_CASE_STATUS_SUSPENDED_SUBJECT
message.locale: Reassessment could not be completed on case %1s as it currently has a status of 'Suspended'.The product type is %2s and the name of the primary client is %3s.

message.name: INF_CASE_STATUS_SUSPENDED_REASON
message.locale: Reassessment could not be completed on case %1s as it currently has a status of 'Suspended'. The effect of the reassessment will be considered at a later date if/when the case is unsuspended, approved and activated.
